amendment.description: An amendment to reduce the total appropriation in the bill (other than for assistance for Israel) by 0.5 percent across-the-board.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the total appropriation in the bill (other than for assistance for Israel) by 0.5 percent across-the-board.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Musgrave amendment (A034) Failed by recorded vote: 179 - 241 (Roll no. 539).
